name: Loop Game
description:
Game made for BlackWhiteJam #8. The theme was: "Loop". 

Local multiplayer available!

Loop game is a tournament for all the risk lovers. Race your friends on a deadly track or test how many laps you can survive alone.

*Recommended with sounds on*

Controls:

Each player is controlled with a single key. Pick your key while in lobby. During the game pressing your key will make your player run while releasing it will make him stop. 

Rules:

Avoid being spot by the Eye and running into pits and try to make it to the end. Just to run one more lap...
